title: Know When to Fold ‘Em!
description:
How do you recognize an unhealthy friendship when it happens to overlap an issue you have that triggers you to sabotage the good things in your life? Plus, Jillian's Top 5 Workout Moves, and emails about appetite, stress eating, and more!        

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy


This Week’s Sponsors:

RITUAL.com/JILLIAN for 10% off during your first 3 months

THIRDLOVE.com/Jillian for 15% off your first purchase
